communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Source: https://news.asu.edu/20240717-sun-devil-community-real-time-analysis-center-enhances-protection-community-resources

All invoices, licenses, contracts, MOUs, memos, reports and other agreement documents between Arizona State University and companies providing LPR Cameras. Such companies may include but are not limited to Flock Safety, Rhombus, Vigilant Solutions, Motorola, Insight. Please search for documents dated between 1/1/2023-01/29/25.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Y.E

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Montana Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Hello! 

I am requesting sworn officer rosters for your department from 2020 to 2025. 
The rosters should include serial numbers, names, and police officer positions. 

Thank you!

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Joey Scott
